long_description: With an integrated 1L hydration bladder, the Mysterioso Hydration Long-Sleeve Shirt for women offers water-friendly fabric and built-in hydration for any type of paddling. Form fitting pocket holds a 1L hydration bladder; compression-fit top uses tension bands sewn into the fabric to support the weight of the bladder. Moisture-wicking, quick-drying, sun-protective fabric along with the highly engineered body silhouette are designed to work in and out of the water.
short_description: With an integrated 1L hydration bladder, the Mysterioso Hydration Long-Sleeve Shirt for women offers water-friendly fabric and built-in hydration for any type of paddling.
